nodes.text: Triumph of the Galactic Empire was a pro-Galactic Empire painting created some time during the Galactic Civil War. It depicted a Glory-class dark trooper holding a T-21 light repeating blaster, with smoking ruins behind it and a corpse (presumably Rebel) reaching a hand into the air on the bottom right.. It was sometimes released separately, although a multi-painting version combining it with its pro-Rebel counterpart, Victory of the Rebel Alliance, Forces Under Siege, did exist.

Triumph of the Galactic Empire was awarded to players following the release of Game Update 15. It was a random selection between two paintings for players who reactivated their accounts between February 1 and March 1 (the other painting being Victory of the Rebel Alliance, although players whose accounts were in good standing before February 1 and continued to be in good standing after March 1 were rewarded with both paintings via the multi-painting, as a way to gain both paintings as a bonus. It is the only known painting under the multi-painting category within the game.
